#summary Short explanation on how to use this script.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Requirements =

 #. php5-cli
 #. php5-mysql
 #. PEAR's HTML_BBCodeParser (http://pear.php.net/package/HTML_BBCodeParser)

= Usage =

 #. Edit config.php. Set your database configuration
 #. Create static/ directory
{{{
$ mkdir static
}}}
 #. Run convert.php script
{{{
$ php convert.php
}}}
 #. Copy resources (css, js, etc)
{{{
$ cp -a templates/res/* static/
}}}
 #. Point your browser to static/ directory
 #. That's all :)
